resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81520</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81520</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4503</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">An Integrated Approach to Teaching Irish Music</string>
            <string language="es">Una metodología integrada para la enseñanza de la música irlandesa</string>
            <string language="ga">Cur chuige Imeasctha don Cheol Gaelach a Mhúineadh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine integrierte Annäherung an das Unterrichten 
der irischen Musik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une approche intégrée à enseigner la musique 
irlandaise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma aproximação integrada a ensinar a música 
irish</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un metodo integrato ad insegnare musica 
irlandese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ολοκληρωμένη προσέγγιση στη διδασκαλία της 
ιρλανδικής μουσικής</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This methodology and supporting student worksheets are aimed at all levels. A list of various activities for classroom use is provided and examples of student worksheets can be photocopied for use with some of the activities listed.</string>
            <string language="es">Esta metodología y hojas de trabajo de apoyo para los estudiantes están dirigidas a todos los niveles. Se ofrece una lista de varias actividades para el uso en clase y se pueden fotocopiar ejemplos de hojas de trabajo de los estudiantes para utilizarlas c</string>
            <string language="ga">Tá an modheolaíocht agus na bileoga oibre do na daltaí dírithe ar gach leibhéal. Is féidir liosta gníomhaíochtaí difriúla don seomra ranga agus samplaí de bhileoga oibre do na mic léinn a fhotachóipeáil le cuid de na gníomhaíochtaí liostaithe.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Music</string>
            <string language="es">Música</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irish Music</string>
            <string language="es">Música irlandesa</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceol Gaelach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Methodenlehre und unterstützenden 
Kursteilnehmerbogen werden alle Stufen angestrebt. Eine Liste 
der verschiedenen Aktivitäten für Klassenzimmergebrauch wird zur 
Verfügung gestellt und Beispiele der Kursteilnehmerbogen können für
Gebrauch mit einigen der ausgedruckten worden Aktivitäten 
photokopiert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces méthodologie et tableaux supportants 
d'étudiant sont visés tous les niveaux. Une liste de diverses 
activités pour l'usage de salle de classe est fournie et des exemples
des tableaux d'étudiant peuvent être photocopiés pour l'usage avec 
certaines des activités énumérées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas metodologia e folhas suportando do 
estudante são visadas todos os níveis. Uma lista de várias 
atividades para o uso da sala de aula é fornecida e os exemplos de 
folhas do estudante podem photocopied para o uso com algumas das 
atividades alistadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi metodologia e fogli di lavoro di sostegno 
dell'allievo sono puntati su tutti i livelli. Una lista di varie
attività per uso dell'aula è fornita e gli esempi dei fogli di 
lavoro dell'allievo possono essere fotocopiati per uso con alcune 
delle attività elencate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτήν την μεθοδολογία και τα ενισχυτικά φύλλα 
εργασίας σπουδαστών στοχεύουν σε όλα τα επίπεδα. Ένας 
κατάλογος διάφορων δραστηριοτήτων για τη χρήση τάξεων παρέχεται 
και τα παραδείγματα των φύλλων εργασίας σπουδαστών μπορούν να 
φωτοτυπηθούν για τη χρήση με μερικές από τις δραστηριότητες που 
εμφανίζονται λίστα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irische Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique Irlandaise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música Irish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica Irlandese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιρλανδική μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.
